posts.message: Starting your day with a server down and when you try to take it up it goes down again is not a good thing. Note to self check the slow queries before trying any shit.

posts.caption: stackoverflow.com
posts.description: Is it standard behaviour for browsers to only send the checkbox input value data if it is checked upon form submission? And if no value data is supplied, is the default value always "on"? Assuming the above is correct, is this consistent behaviour across all browsers?
